RACE.NAME: HUMAN
RACE.FAVCLASS: Any. When determining whether a multiclass human takes an experience point penalty, his or her highest-level class does not count.
RACE.SIZE: Medium: As Medium creatures, humans have no special bonuses or penalties due to their size.
RACE.SPEED: Human base land speed is 30 feet.
RACE.TRAITS: 1 extra feat at 1st level. 4 extra skill points at 1st level and 1 extra skill point at each additional level.
RACE.BONUSLANGUAGES: Any (other than secret languages such as Druidic)

RACE.NAME: DWARF
RACE.SPECIALABILITIES: Darkvision, Stonecunning, Weapon Familiarity(Dwarven Waraxe), Weapon Familiarity(Dwarven Urgrosh), Stability
RACE.FAVCLASS: Fighter. A multiclass dwarf 's fighter class does not count when determining whether he takes an experience point penalty for multiclassing
RACE.SIZE: Medium: As Medium creatures, dwarves have no special bonuses or penalties due to their size.
RACE.SPEED: Dwarf base land speed is 20 feet. However, dwarves can move at this speed even when wearing medium or heavy armor or when carrying a medium or heavy load (unlike other creatures, whose speed is reduced in such situations).
RACE.SKILLCHECKADJ: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison. +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like effects. +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against orcs and goblinoids. +4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against monsters of the giant type. Any time a creature loses its Dexterity bonus (if any) to Armor Class, such as when it's caught flat-footed, it loses its dodge bonus, too. +2 racial bonus on Appraise checks that are related to stone or metal items. +2 racial bonus on Craft checks that are related to stone or metal.
RACE.BONUSLANGUAGES: Giant, Gnome, Goblin, Orc, Terran, Undercommon

RACE.NAME: ELF
RACE.DESCRIPTION: Immunity to magic sleep effects, and a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells or effects.
RACE.SPECIALABILITIES: Low-Light Vision, Weapon Proficiency (Longbow), Weapon Proficiency (Shortbow), Weapon Proficiency (Longsword), Weapon Proficiency (Rapier)
RACE.FAVCLASS: Fighter. A multiclass dwarf 's fighter class does not count when determining whether he takes an experience point penalty for multiclassing
RACE.SIZE: Medium: As Medium creatures, dwarves have no special bonuses or penalties due to their size.
RACE.SPEED: Elf base land speed is 30 feet.
RACE.SKILLCHECKADJ: +2 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks. An elf who merely passes within 5 feet of a secret or concealed door is entitled to a Search check to notice it as if she were actively looking for it.
RACE.BONUSLANGUAGES: Giant, Gnome, Goblin, Orc, Terran, Undercommon

RACE.NAME: GNOME
RACE.SPECIALABILITIES: Low-Light Vision, Weapon Familiarity (Gnome Hooked Hammer)
RACE.FAVCLASS: Bard. A multiclass gnome's bard class does not count when determining whether he takes an experience point penalty.
RACE.SIZE: Small: As a Small creature, a gnome gains a +1 size bonus to Armor Class, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, and a +4 size bonus on Hide checks, but he uses smaller weapons than humans use, and his lifting and carrying limits are three-quarters of those of a Medium character.
RACE.SPEED: Gnome base land speed is 20 feet.
RACE.TRAITS: Spell-Like Abilities: 1/day-speak with animals (burrowing mammal only, duration 1 minute). A gnome with a Charisma score of at least 10 also has the following spell-like abilities: 1/day-dancing lights, ghost sound, prestidigitation. Caster level 1st; save DC 10 + gnome's Cha modifier + spell level.
RACE.SKILLCHECKADJ: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against illusions. Add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against illusion spells cast by gnomes. This adjustment stacks with those from similar effects. +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against kobolds and goblinoids. +4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against monsters of the giant type. Any time a creature loses its Dexterity bonus (if any) to Armor Class, such as when it's caught flat-footed, it loses its dodge bonus, too. +2 racial bonus on Listen checks. +2 racial bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks.
RACE.BONUSLANGUAGES: Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Goblin, Orc

RACE.NAME: HALF-ELF
RACE.DESCRIPTION: Immunity to sleep spells and similar magical effects, and a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against enchantment spells or effects.
RACE.FAVCLASS: Any. When determining whether a multiclass half-elf takes an experience point penalty, her highest-level class does not count.
RACE.SIZE: Medium: As Medium creatures, half-elves have no special bonuses or penalties due to their size.
RACE.SPEED: Half-elf base land speed is 30 feet.
RACE.TRAITS: Elven Blood: For all effects related to race, a half-elf is considered an elf.
RACE.SKILLCHECKADJ: +1 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks. +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Gather Information checks.
RACE.BONUSLANGUAGES: Any (other than secret languages such as Druidic)

RACE.NAME: HALF-ORC
RACE.FAVCLASS: Barbarian. A multiclass half-orc's barbarian class does not count when determining whether he takes an experience point penalty.
RACE.SIZE: Medium: As Medium creatures, half-orcs have no special bonuses or penalties due to their size.
RACE.SPEED: Half-orc base land speed is 30 feet.
RACE.TRAITS: A half-orc's starting Intelligence score is always at least 3. If this adjustment would lower the character's score to 1 or 2, his score is nevertheless 3. Orc Blood: For all effects related to race, a half-orc is considered an orc.
RACE.SKILLCHECKADJ: +1 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks. +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Gather Information checks.

RACE.NAME: HALFLING
RACE.FAVCLASS: Rogue. A multiclass halfling's rogue class does not count when determining whether she takes an experience point penalty for multiclassing.
RACE.SIZE: Small: As a Small creature, a halfling gains a +1 size bonus to Armor Class, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, and a +4 size bonus on Hide checks, but she uses smaller weapons than humans use, and her lifting and carrying limits are three-quarters of those of a Medium character.
RACE.SPEED: Halfling base land speed is 20 feet.
RACE.SKILLCHECKADJ: +2 racial bonus on Climb, Jump, and Move Silently checks. +1 racial bonus on all saving throws. +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear: This bonus stacks with the halfling's +1 bonus on saving throws in general. +1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown weapons and slings. +2 racial bonus on Listen checks.
